main.description: Deletes a private bookmark for the specified at-uri record. Requires authentication.

uri.description: The at-uri of the record to be removed from bookmarks. Currently, only `app.bsky.feed.post` records are supported.

errors.name: NotFound
errors.description: A bookmark with the specified parameters was not found.

errors.name: UnsupportedCollection
errors.description: The URI to be bookmarked is for an unsupported collection.
